sentence.Network_en: I simply gave in to him, and I've regretted it ever since.
sentence.Network_cn: 我居然向他让步了,后来我一直为此后悔不已.

sentence.Network_en: I immediately regretted having said this— I could have kicked myself.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一说完这话就后悔了——我都想抽自己。
他对自己的粗鲁感到后悔。

PerfectNetExp.abs: i regretted telling my mother the truth ., 我后悔把真相告诉了我母亲.
days which ( or that ) are wasted may be pleasant but they will be regretted .浪费掉的时光也许是快乐的，但是一定会让人后悔。
He regretted missing this wonderful match ., 他抱憾错过了这场精彩的比赛.
it is a matter to be regretted .这是一件令人遗憾的事。

entry.def: If you regret something that you have done, you wish that you had not done it.

example.ex: I simply gave in to him, and I've regretted it ever since...
example.tran: 我就向他屈服了，从那以后我一直后悔。

example.ex: Ellis seemed to be regretting that he had asked the question...
example.tran: 埃利斯好像后悔问了这个问题。

entry.def: Regret is a feeling of sadness or disappointment, which is caused by something that has happened or something that you have done or not done.

example.ex: My great regret in life is that I didn't bring home the America's Cup...
example.tran: 我这辈子最大的遗憾就是没有把美洲杯捧回家。

example.ex: Lillee said he had no regrets about retiring.

entry.tran: 为…抱歉;很遗憾地说/通知你
entry.def: You can say that you regret something as a polite way of saying that you are sorry about it. You use expressions such as I regret to say or I regret to inform you to show that you are sorry about something.

example.ex: 'I very much regret the injuries he sustained,' he said...
example.tran: “我对他的受伤感到很遗憾，”他说。

example.ex: I regret that the United States has added its voice to such protests...
example.tran: 我很遗憾美国也加入了这一抗议的行列。

entry.def: If someone expresses regret about something, they say that they are sorry about it.

example.ex: He expressed great regret and said that surgeons would attempt to reverse the operation...
example.tran: 他深表歉意，说外科医生会努力消除手术造成的损伤。

example.ex: She has accepted his resignation with regret.
example.tran: 她遗憾地接受了他的辞职。

auth_sentence.content: He was genuinely sorry and regretted what had happened.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was genuinely sorry and regretted what had happened.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was genuinely sorry and regretted what had happened.

auth_sentence.content: Later, he always regretted the things he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Later, he always regretted the things he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Later, he always regretted the things he said.

auth_sentence.content: Jyotsna has never regretted the choice she made.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jyotsna has never regretted the choice she made.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jyotsna has never regretted the choice she made.
